message.content:
Monday:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with tomatoes and spinach served with whole grain toast.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, corn), topped with a balsamic vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli.

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Fruit salad made with apples, bananas, berries, and oranges.
Lunch: Black bean and vegetable stir-fry with brown rice.
Dinner: Baked salmon with a side of roasted asparagus and quinoa.

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal topped with fresh fruit (such as blueberries, strawberries) and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain crackers.
Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers filled with quinoa, black beans, and mixed vegetables.

Thursday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen berries, spinach, banana, and coconut milk.
Lunch: Grilled portobello mushroom sandwich on whole grain bread with avocado and tomato slices.
Dinner: Baked cod with roasted cauliflower and zucchini.

Friday:
Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole-grain bread, topped with a poached egg and red pepper flakes.
Lunch: Veggie wrap with spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, and hummus wrapped in a tortilla.
Dinner: Grilled chicken fajitas with bell peppers, onions, and served with brown rice.

Saturday:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt topped with fresh fruit, chia seeds, and a drizzle of honey (substitute agave nectar or maple syrup).
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables, chickpeas, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken fajitas with bell peppers, onions, and served with brown rice.

Sunday:
Breakfast: Veggie omelette with spinach, tomatoes, mushrooms, and whole grain toast.
Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain crackers.
Dinner: Baked ziti with a side of roasted asparagus.

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day!
